text: A person  saying "Joe Keaton disapproved of films, and Buster also had reservations about the medium."

original_data.title: Common Voice
original_data.description: Each entry in the dataset consists of a unique MP3 and corresponding text file. Many of the 24,211 recorded hours in the dataset also include demographic metadata like age, sex, and accent that can help train the accuracy of speech recognition engines.
original_data.text: Joe Keaton disapproved of films, and Buster also had reservations about the medium.
